title: Anjali Anjali Pushpanjali Lyrics Duet
stanzas: <div>Anjali Anjali Pushpanjali Lyrics Duet
Anjali anjali pushpanjali

poove un padhaththil
pushpanjali
ponne un paerukku
ponnaanjali
kanne un kuralukku
geethaanjali
kan kaanaa azhagukku
kavithaanjali

Anjali anjali pushpanjali
Anjali anjali pushpanjali

poove un padhaththil
pushpanjali
ponne un paerukku
ponnaanjali
kanne un kuralukku
geethaanjali
kan kaanaa azhagukku
kavithaanjali

kandhal vandhu theendum
varai iruvarum thani thani
kadhalin pon sangili
inaithadhu kanmani.

kadalile mazhai veelntha pin
endha thuli mazhai thuli
kadhalil adhupola naan
kalanthitten kadhali.

thirumagal thirupaatham
pidithuvitten.
dhinam oru pudhu paadal
vadithu vitten
anjali anjali enuyir kadhali

poove un padhaththil
pushpanjali
ponne un paerukku
ponnaanjali
kanne un kuralukku
geethaanjali
kan kaanaa azhagukku
kavithaanjali

poove un padhaththil
pushpanjali
ponne un paerukku
ponnaanjali
kanne un kuralukku
geethaanjali
kan kaanaa azhagukku
kavithaanjal

Seethaiyin kadhal andru
vizhivali nulaindhathu
kodhaiyin kadhal indru
sevi vazhi pugunthadhu

ennavo en nenjinai
isai vandhu thulaithathu
isai vandha paadhai vazhi
Tamil mella nulaindhathu

isai vandha dhisai paarthu
manam kulaindhen
Tamil vandha dhisai paarthu
uyir kasinthen
anjali anjali ivalkalai kadhali.

anbe un anbukku
pushpaanjali
nanbaa un kannukku
nadanaanjali
kannaa un isai vaazha
geethaanjali
kaviye un Tamizh vaazha
kavithaanjali

Anjali anjali pushpanjali
Anjali anjali pushpanjali

poove un padhaththil
pushpanjali
ponne un paerukku
ponnaanjali
kanne un kuralukku
geethaanjali
kan kaanaa azhagukku
kavithaanjali

Azhagiye unai polave
adhisayam illaiye
anjali perai sonnen
avilndhadhu mullaiye

karthigai maadham ponaal
kadum mazhai illaiye
kanmani nee illaiyel
kavidhaigal illaiye

nee enna nilavodu
pirandhavalaa
poovukkul karuvaagi
valarndhavalaa
anjali anjali ennuyir kadhali

pushpanjali
ponne un paerukku
